title: identity
description: This object represents basic identifying information for individuals and organizations.

type.description: The type of this object, which MUST be the literal `identity`.

description.description: A description that provides more details and context about Identity.

aliases.description: A list of other names that this entity is believed to use.

is_organization.description: If true, organization. If false, individual.

is_class.description: If true, this refers to the class or group of entities matching this description. If false, this refers to a specific entity.

functions.description: The list of functions that this identity performs.

sectors.description: The list of sectors that this identity belongs to. Open Vocab - sector-ov

localities.description: The list of localities (regions, nationalities) for this identity.
